title: Ivan Parker: The Tailor of Truth

story.text: Ivan Parker discovers a mysterious thread that glows in the moonlight among his sewing supplies. Intrigued, he uses it to patch an old jacket.
Wearing the jacket, Ivan notices that he can hear people's true thoughts when they lie. Amazed by this power, he decides to use it to help others discern truth from deceit.
Ivan is approached by a friend who suspects her business partner of embezzlement. Ivan agrees to help by attending their next meeting.
During the meeting, Ivan's jacket allows him to confirm the partner's guilt. He discreetly informs his friend, leading to a peaceful resolution and recovery of the mishandled funds.
Word of Ivan's unique abilities spreads, and he becomes a popular consultant, helping solve disputes and unmask dishonesty with the aid of his enchanted jacket.
A local journalist suspects corruption in the city council and seeks Ivan's help. Together, they attend a council meeting.
Ivan's jacket reveals the corruption among several council members. The truth, when exposed, leads to reforms and a thankfulness from the community towards Ivan.

ending: Thus, Ivan Parker sewed justice into the fabric of society, one thread of truth at a time.
moral: Truth is a powerful ally, and small acts can lead to significant changes.
